name: Personal Website
description: My personal portfolio website built with React, Tailwind, and Cloudflare Pages to keep in touch with frontend skills & have something to show for it.
detailed_description: This website is built using Next.js and TypeScript, styled with Tailwind CSS, and deployed on Cloudflare Pages. It features a responsive design, dark mode support, and interactive elements to showcase my projects and skills effectively.

name: sWARm
description: Personal project aimed at analyzing and projecting baseball player performance. It calculates metrics similar to fWAR and bWAR, employing data parsing and traditional machine learning algorithms to assess player value.
detailed_description: sWARm is a Python-based project that analyzes baseball player performance using data from sources like Baseball Savant, Fangraphs and other reputable sources. It attempts to calculate an equivalent to the industry standard WARP/fWAR and employs a variety of machine learning algorithms ranging from basic linear regression to a neural net to project future performance. The project utilizes libraries such as Pandas for data manipulation, scikit-learn and Keras for machine learning, and Plotly for data visualization.

name: Scentinel
description: Based off of recent cologne wear, season, and notes in cologne -> suggest a variety of colognes from current collection to potentially wear
detailed_description: Scentinel is a machine learning project that recommends colognes based on recent wear patterns, seasonal trends, and fragrance notes. Built using Python and Scikit Learn, it leverages collaborative filtering and content-based filtering techniques to provide personalized fragrance suggestions. The project utilizes a dataset of cologne attributes and user preferences to train the recommendation model.
